comment._content: "Thomas Mitchell Campbell (April 22, 1856 – April 1, 1923) was the 24th Governor of Texas from 1907 to 1911. ... In 1916, he ran unsuccessfully for the United States Senate." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thomas_Mitchell_Campbell
